scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin blog.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/blog.html && usemin stores.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/stores.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin shelters.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/shelters.html && usemin boarding.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/boarding.html && usemin servicedogs.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/servicedogs.html && usemin comment.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/comment.html
